full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SGRA MI SNYAN GYI TSE SGRUBS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B ('DI NI BLO BZANG GRAGS PA YIS, ,@006A *, ,BSHES GNYEN BLO GSAL DON GNYER CAN, ,SANGS RGYAS MGON POS BSKUL TE BKOD, ,ZHAL GDAMS YI GER BRIS PA LA, ,MA YIS BU GCIG PA LA BZHIN, ,CHOS BDAG RNAMS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZOD, ,DGE BAS 'GRO BA MA LUS PA, ,'CHI BDAG BDUD LAS RAB RGYAL TE, ,RDO RJE'I TSE NI THOB PAR SHOG , 'DI YANG MKHAS BTZUN BLA MA'I GSUNG BZHIN BKOD PA'O,,SHU BHA MASTU,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, DGE'O,, ,,)
